mapper.select: SELECT db.text AS BINGZHONG, COUNT( z.xingming ) AS COUNT FROM dict_bingzhong db LEFT JOIN zhuyuan z ON z.bingzhong = db.id GROUP BY db.id ORDER BY db.ordernum ASC
mapper.sql: zhuyuanid, jiuzhenxinxiid, userid, xingming, bingzhong, chuangjianshijian, shenhejieguo, shenheyijian, shenheshijian, zhuangtai
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from zhuyuan
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into zhuyuan (zhuyuanid, jiuzhenxinxiid, userid, xingming, bingzhong, chuangjianshijian, shenhejieguo, shenheyijian, shenheshijian, zhuangtai) values (#{zhuyuanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shenhejieguo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shenheyijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shenheshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER})

userid,
xingming,
bingzhong,
chuangjianshijian,
shenhejieguo,
shenheyijian,

mapper.update:
update zhuyuan
zhuyuanid = #{record.zhuyuanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jiuzhenxinxiid = #{record.jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingming = #{record.xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bingzhong = #{record.bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chuangjianshijian = #{record.chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shenhejieguo = #{record.shenhejieguo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shenheyijian = #{record.shenheyijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shenheshijian = #{record.shenheshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zhuangtai = #{record.zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update zhuyuan set zhuyuanid = #{record.zhuyuanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiuzhenxinxiid = #{record.jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingming = #{record.xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bingzhong = #{record.bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chuangjianshijian = #{record.chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shenhejieguo = #{record.shenhejieguo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shenheyijian = #{record.shenheyijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenheshijian = #{record.shenheshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zhuangtai = #{record.zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zhuyuan
jiuzhenxinxiid = #{jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingming = #{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bingzhong = #{bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chuangjianshijian = #{chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shenhejieguo = #{shenhejieguo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shenheyijian = #{shenheyijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

zhuangtai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where zhuyuanid = #{zhuyuanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
